section.para: Disables the NetFS functionality, which encapsulates NFS, NovellÂ® Netware, and Windows file sharing services. NFS

If network file sharing functionality is not needed, the NetFS functionality can safely be disabled. Although NetFS is not a persistent daemon, deactivating these protocols makes the system much easier to audit.
